## Data preprocessing

```{r}
  #find NA across all
  missing = dataSetReader[, sapply(dataSetReader, anyNA), drop = FALSE]

  cat("Missing data found in ",ncol(missing),"Columns, which is",
    ncol(missing)/ncol(dataSetReader)*100, "% of features")
```

```{r}
  #The missing columns and how many missing value it has
  missingData <- sapply(dataSetReader,function(x) {sum(is.na(x))})
  Position(function(x) x > 0, missingData)
```

```{r}
  MissingNames <- names(dataSetReader[, sapply(dataSetReader, anyNA), drop = FALSE])

  for (i in MissingNames){
    dataSetReader[is.na(dataSetReader[,i]),i] <- median(dataSetReader[,i],na.rm = T)}

#Find number of missing values/check ranges
sum(is.na(dataSetReader))
```

### Check Duplicate Data Record
```{r}
  nrow(dataSetReader)
  nrow(dataSetReader[!duplicated(dataSetReader),])
```
